snippet: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a new injectable diabetes drug from Eli Lilly for adults with the most common form of the disease.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves Trulicity, new injectable drug for Type 2 diabetes developed by Eli Lilly.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a new injectable diabetes drug from Eli Lilly for adults with the most common form of the disease.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Trulicity, a Drug for Type 2 Diabetes
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Drug for Type 2 Diabetes
